name: Dify Workflow Caller
description:
Usage Instructions:
1. Sends current page information (title, URL, content, selected text) to a Dify server workflow for automated processing.
2. Add Dify workflows on the extension options page (enter server URL, API key, input parameter name; workflow type only).
3. On Dify, create a workflow with a string input parameter (e.g., webinfo) matching the extension settings.
4. Sent format:
   Title: <page title>
   URL: <page URL>
   Selected Text: <user selected text>
   Content: <first 2000 characters of page content>
5. "Current page not supported" means the page's security policy prevents script injection.
See README.md for details.
